name: Hot Blueberries (From Jimmy Steinmeyer)
recipeCategory: easy, quick, ice creams and sorbets
keywords: blueberries, butter, vanilla ice cream, dessert, summer

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, over low heat, melt the butter. Add the berries, sprinkle with the sugar and cook until they give off their liquid and collapse, about eight minutes. Remove from the heat.
Serve hot over the vanilla ice cream.
